SuperClixer
If they were going to increase the scale, they could of at least gave us the Fantastic Four in their Blue Costumes, and for the Thing, at 150.
February 25, 2021
Jarosa
If you have 15 more points reach for She-Hulk. I do like his ability to charge though blocking and he does start with Quake. His Captain trait doesn't make him a better option even on a sidekick team.
February 20, 2021
KillerKing
Personally I don't like him much. For 60 points he doesn't anything really that good that other similar characters can do. His captain ability isn't worth it either, for me at least.
February 11, 2021
Goop
She-Hulk is quite a bit better for just 15pts more. I dont think Toughness for the sidekicks is worth it. Human Torch, Spiderman, Awesome Andy, Jim Hammond and Invisible woman all do a much better job protecting them. At 40pts second line though he's a better deal.
